body:
I decided to go with string arguments mainly because of two reasons:
1. To be somewhat consistent with the way `tf.layers` handles different modes. E.g. [`data_format` in `tf.layers.Conv2d`](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/layers/Conv2D).
2. If down the road there's an additional similar gradient penalty mode this solution would not need a breaking API change since the new mode could just be added to the string set.

That said, I'm happy to switch to a boolean argument if prefered. What do you think?
